üìä Roadmap Overview

This learning roadmap aggregates documentation from all NatureQuest projects:

  • DevMentor: 200+ docs on infrastructure, Kubernetes, AI services
  • QuizMentor: 70+ docs on mobile dev, testing, gamification
  • Harvest.ai: 15+ docs on architecture, strategy, deployment

üìñ 30-Day Complete Journey

Week 1: Foundation & Architecture

Days 1-2: Ecosystem Understanding

  • /devmentor/docs/designpatterns/SYSTEM_DESIGN_BLUEPRINT.md - Complete architecture (2hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/designpatterns/DESIGN_PATTERNS_GUIDE.md - Pattern library (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/architecture/COMPLETE_E2E_INTERACTION_ARCHITECTURE.md - E2E flows (1.5hr)

QuizMentor Platform

  • /QuizMentor/docs/PROJECT_OVERVIEW.md - Platform overview (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/README.md - Documentation index (30min)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/PLATFORM_VISION.md - Product vision (30min)

Harvest.ai Intelligence

  • /Harvest.ai/docs/architecture/COMPLETE_SYSTEM_ARCHITECTURE.md - System design (1.5hr)
  • /Harvest.ai/docs/architecture/CONCURRENCY_AND_LOCKING_PATTERNS.md - Patterns (1hr)

Days 3-4: Development Environment

Database & Auth Setup

  • /QuizMentor/docs/SUPABASE_SETUP_GUIDE.md - Supabase configuration (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/SUPABASE_SETUP.md - DevMentor auth (1hr)
  • /QuizMentor/docs/AUTHENTICATION_DESIGN.md - Auth patterns (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/UNIFIED_AUTH.md - Unified authentication (45min)

Infrastructure Setup

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/README.md - Infrastructure navigation (30min)
  • /devmentor/docs/BETA_ARCHITECTURE_AND_HYBRID_SETUP.md - Hybrid setup (1hr)
  • /Harvest.ai/docs/deployment/DEPLOYMENT_GUIDE.md - Deployment basics (1hr)

Days 5-7: Container Orchestration

Kubernetes Fundamentals

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/CONTAINER_ORCHESTRATION_GUIDE.md - K8s complete (3hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/DEVMENTOR_CONTAINER_QUICKREF.md - Commands (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/INGRESS_RUNBOOK.md - Traffic routing (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/cluster_beta-readiness.md - Cluster prep (45min)

Service Mesh

  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/ISTIO_SIDECAR_AUTH_SETUP.md - Istio setup (1hr)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/ISTIO_KIALI_SIDECAR_RUNBOOK.md - Kiali viz (45min)
  • /devmentor/docs/infrastructure/kubernetes/istio_mesh_beta-readiness.md - Mesh readiness (45min)

Week 2: Services & Integration

üöÄ Next Steps

After completing the 30-day journey:

  1. Choose a Specialization - Deep dive into one product
  2. Build Something - Create a feature or tool
  3. Contribute Back - Improve documentation
  4. Share Knowledge - Write blog posts or create tutorials
  5. Join Community - Participate in discussions

üìû Support & Resources

  • Documentation Issues: GitHub Issues
  • Questions: Use product-specific channels
  • Updates: Check status docs regularly
  • Community: Join Discord/Slack when available
